staticBinding.value: eth0 eth1 ${server.ip.backup} ${pc.backupvlan.subnetmask} bond0 eth2 eth3 ${server.ip.primary} ${subnet_mask_IP1} bond1 eth4 eth5 ${server.ip.secondary} ${subnet_mask_IP2} bond2

#!/bin/bash
PROD_NAME="bond1" PROD_IP="${server.ip.primary}" PROD_MASK="${subnet_mask_IP1}" PROD_GATEWAY="${server.gateway}"
REDHAT_PATH2ETH=/etc/sysconfig/network-scripts #REDHAT_ROUTE_FILE=/etc/sysconfig/network REDHAT_ROUTE_FILE=/etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/route-$PROD_NAME SUSE_PATH2ETH=/etc/sysconfig/network SUSE_ROUTE_FILE=$SUSE_PATH2ETH/routes SUSE=1 REDHAT=0 OSTYPE=$SUSE
function detect_distribution() { # check if the running system a SUSE or a Redhat distribution local redhat_release=/etc/redhat-release local suse_release=/etc/SuSE-release
if [ -f $redhat_release ]; then OSTYPE=$REDHAT fi if [ -f $suse_release ]; then OSTYPE=$SUSE fi }
detect_distribution
if [ $OSTYPE -eq $SUSE ]; then PATH2ETH=$SUSE_PATH2ETH else PATH2ETH=$REDHAT_PATH2ETH fi
echo $PATH2ETH
if [ $OSTYPE -eq $SUSE ]; then rm -f /etc/sysconfig/network/ifcfg-eth-id-* if [ "$PROD_IP" ]; then echo "Setting default route to gateway: "$PROD_GATEWAY echo "default $PROD_GATEWAY - $PROD_NAME" >> $SUSE_ROUTE_FILE fi fi
if [ $OSTYPE -eq $REDHAT ]; then if [ "$PROD_IP" ]; then echo "Setting default route to gateway: "$PROD_GATEWAY #sed -i -e "/^GATEWAY=/d" -e "/^HOSTNAME=/a GATEWAY=$PROD_GATEWAY" $REDHAT_ROUTE_FILE echo "default via $PROD_GATEWAY" > $REDHAT_ROUTE_FILE fi fi
/etc/init.d/network restart
if [ $OSTYPE -eq $REDHAT ]; then /etc/init.d/ntpd restart fi
if [ $OSTYPE -eq $SUSE ]; then /etc/init.d/ntp restart fi
if [ -f /opt/opsware/agent/pylibs/cog/bs_hardware ]; then /opt/opsware/agent/pylibs/cog/bs_hardware --force --debug > /var/tmp/opsware_register.log if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "!! ERROR: Error occurs when trying to regist the target server with SA" echo "" exit 2 fi fi
eth0 eth1 ${server.ip.backup} ${pc.backupvlan.subnetmask} bond0 eth2 eth3 ${server.ip.primary} ${subnet_mask_IP1} bond1
